name: [MW] AI Customer Support Assistant - Cloud Version

parameters.content:
# 🌐 AI Customer Support Assistant - Cloud Version

## What this workflow does:
This AI-powered customer support automation processes incoming support requests via email or chat, analyzes them using AI, retrieves relevant context, and generates draft responses for support agents.

## Key Features:
✅ **Multi-channel Input**: Email & chat triggers
✅ **AI-powered Analysis**: Extracts sentiment, urgency, and key information
✅ **Context Integration**: Combines product manuals, ERP data, and support history
✅ **Draft Response Generation**: Creates professional responses in German
✅ **Human-in-the-loop**: Approval workflow before sending to customers

## Demo Instructions:
1. Use the Chat interface to test with sample customer queries
2. Or send test emails to trigger the email workflow
3. Watch how AI analyzes and generates contextual responses

**🌐 This is the CLOUD version using OpenAI and Google services**

## 📧 Email Trigger

**Purpose**: Monitors Gmail for incoming customer support requests

**How it works**:
• Polls Gmail every minute for new emails
• Filters can be configured for specific labels/criteria
• Extracts email content, sender info, and metadata

**Demo tip**: Send a test email to see this in action!

## 💬 Chat Trigger

**Purpose**: Provides a real-time chat interface for testing

**How it works**:
• Creates a webhook URL for chat interactions
• Ideal for demos and testing scenarios
• Processes messages instantly

**Demo tip**: Perfect for live demonstrations!

## 🧠 AI Information Extractor

**Purpose**: Analyzes customer messages with AI to extract structured data

**Extracts**:
• Category (technical, billing, sales, etc.)
• Urgency level (low, medium, high, critical)
• Customer sentiment
• Keywords for context search
• Product identifiers
• Required action type

**AI Model**: OpenAI GPT-4o-mini

## 📊 Historical Support Data

**Purpose**: Retrieves previous support cases for context

**Data Source**: Google Sheets with historical customer interactions

**Contains**:
• Previous questions & answers
• Common issues & solutions
• Response templates
• Product-specific guidance

**Why important**: Ensures consistent, high-quality responses

## 📚 Product Knowledge Base

**Purpose**: Accesses comprehensive product documentation

**Data Source**: Google Drive (Primotech Manual PDF)

**Contains**:
• Technical specifications
• Operating instructions
• Troubleshooting guides
• Safety information

**Processing**: PDF text extraction for AI analysis

**Cloud advantage**: Always up-to-date documentation

## 🏢 ERP System Integration

**Purpose**: Retrieves customer & inventory data

**Data Source**: Mock ERP API (demo purposes)

**Provides**:
• Customer account information
• Order history
• Product availability
• Spare part pricing

**Note**: In production, this would connect to your real ERP system

**Cloud benefit**: Real-time data access

## 🤖 Response Generation

**Purpose**: Creates professional customer responses using AI

**AI Model**: OpenAI GPT-4o-mini

**Input Context**:
• Customer's original message
• Extracted information (sentiment, urgency, etc.)
• Product manual content
• Historical support cases
• ERP data (pricing, availability)

**Output**: Professional German response following company standards

## 👥 Human-in-the-Loop Approval

**Purpose**: Ensures quality control before sending responses

**Process**:
1. AI-generated response is sent to support agent
2. Agent reviews and can approve/reject/modify
3. Only approved responses are sent to customers

**Benefits**:
• Quality assurance
• Learning from modifications
• Regulatory compliance

**Note**: Critical for maintaining customer trust

parameters.subject: Customer Support Response - Approval Required

parameters.content:
## How to run a demo
- add google / openai credentials
- change email of approver to something you can access

_metadata.name: Automate Customer Support with Gmail, Google Sheets, ERP Data & GPT-4o AI
